message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the purchase of this incredible product with you. I think it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to start the negotiation at $1100000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product. I would like to propose a lower price of $950000 to reflect my budget constraints.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm still confident that this product is worth more to you. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer a price of $1050000. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the product's value to you.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to counter with a price of $1000000. This aligns more closely with my budget while still recognizing the value of the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I'm still not willing to sell the product for $1000000, as I believe it's worth more to you. I'm willing to make another concession and offer a price of $1030000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept for this product.

Thank you for your continued negotiation, Alice. I appreciate your efforts to find a mutually agreeable price. Considering the value of the product and my budget, I would like to propose a final offer of $1020000.

Thank you for your final offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to sell the product for $1020000. I believe it's worth more to you, and I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll offer a price of $1040000. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
Thank you for your final offer, Alice. I've given this matter considerable thought, and I would like to propose a price of $1035000. This is my best offer, and I hope it will be acceptable to you.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to sell the product for $1035000. I believe it's worth more to you, and I'm not willing to go below $1050000. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.

After careful consideration, I must decline your last offer, Alice. I am unable to meet your price of $1050000. However, I appreciate your efforts and I will consider purchasing the product from John for $1000000.
